sentences.en: Am I calling at an inconvenient time?
sentences.cn: 我电话打得不是时候吧？

sentences.en: Can you come at 10:30? I know it's inconvenient, but I have to see you.
sentences.cn: 你能10:30来吗？我知道这不方便，但是我必须要见你。

sentences.en: He came at an inconvenient time.
He knows it's inconvenient, but he wants to go anyway.
sentences.cn: 他知道不方便, 但他无论如何都想走.

sentences.en: In addition to being wasteful, duplication may be inconvenient and irritating to consumers.
sentences.cn: 重复投资不仅造成浪费, 也会给消费者带来不便和激起不满.

sentences.en: In its inconvenient brightness Rosedale seemed to waver a moment.
sentences.cn: 在这束耀眼的光焰里,罗西德似乎摇摆了一下身体.

sentences.en: In such conditions, any family attachments that developed were at best inconvenient.
sentences.cn: 在这样的条件下, 任何家庭的拖累都是极为不便的.

sentences.en: It is inconvenient to meet tomorrow.
It's very inconvenient to have to wait so long.
Lily had fancied herself sheltered from inconvenient scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 丽丽当时以为没人碍事地监视自己.

sentences.en: Monday’s a bit inconvenient for me. How about Wednesday?
sentences.cn: 周一我不太方便，周三如何？

sentences.en: Saturday is an inconvenient day to see him.
She arrived at an extremely inconvenient moment.
This is inconvenient in the extreme.
Walnut trees that grow too large make it inconvenient to prune, spray, and harvest.
sentences.cn: 生长过大的核桃树,不便于修剪, 喷药和采收.

sentences.en: Will it be inconvenient for him to attend that meeting?
sentences.cn: 他参加那次会议会不方便 吗 ?

sentences.en: You have come at a very inconvenient time.

phrases.tran_cn: 难以忽视的真相（电影名称）

trans.tran_cn: 不方便的，打扰人的，麻烦的，不便
trans.tran_en: causing problems, often in a way that is annoying
